title: How to Send Messages to Friends on Xbox One

steps.headline: Turn on the Xbox One and your dashboard will load on the screen.
steps.description: You will see the games that you have played recently along with some of the new games that are on sale.

steps.headline: Find friends online.
steps.description:
Scroll to the right until you are under the “Friends” tab. Once you hit the Friends tab, you will see a box on the left side of the screen that says “Friends Online.”
Hit the A button on the Friends Online box to load all your friends who are currently online. Your “Favorite” friends will appear at the top.

steps.headline: Scroll through your friends list until you see someone you want to send a message to.
steps.description: Once you find them hit the A button on their name to load their profile.

steps.headline: Send the friend a message.
steps.description: Press the A button on the option that says “Send” at the top of their profile. A list of options will pop up; select “Send Message” here.

steps.headline: Use the on-screen keyboard to type the message you want to send to your friend.
steps.description: Make sure you are careful about using too much shorthand; you want them to understand your message.

steps.headline: Send the message.
steps.description: Press the A button on the “Send” button and your message will be sent. The conversation window will snap to the right side of the screen, and all you have to do now is wait for them to respond.

steps.headline: Click the Start menu on the bottom left side of your computer.
steps.description: Some of your favorite apps and programs will pop up on the screen.

steps.headline: Select the “All Apps” button at the bottom of the menu.
steps.description: Every app you have on your computer will pop up on the screen in alphabetical order.

steps.headline: Load the Xbox app.
steps.description: Go down to “X” and look for the green Xbox app. Click on it to load the Xbox app on your computer.

steps.headline: Log in.
steps.description: Do this by entering your Microsoft email address and password in the text fields on screen. Once you have entered your information, click the login button to load your profile inside the app.

steps.headline: View online friends.
steps.description: Look at the right side of the app. You will see a list of all your friends who are currently online and ready to receive a message.

steps.headline: Click the name of the friend you want to send a message to.
steps.description: All their profile information will load in the Xbox window.

steps.headline: Select the “Message” button at the top of the app beside their name.
steps.description: A window will pop up that shows your previous conversation.

steps.headline: Send your friend a message.
steps.description: Click the “Reply” button and type the message that you want them to see. Press the Enter button on your keyboard when you’re done, and the message will be sent to your friend. They will get the message on their Xbox One.

text:
Using the Xbox One Console Turn on the Xbox One and your dashboard will load on the screen. You will see the games that you have played recently along with some of the new games that are on sale. Find friends online. Scroll to the right until you are under the “Friends” tab. Once you hit the Friends tab, you will see a box on the left side of the screen that says “Friends Online.”
Hit the A button on the Friends Online box to load all your friends who are currently online. Your “Favorite” friends will appear at the top. Scroll through your friends list until you see someone you want to send a message to. Once you find them hit the A button on their name to load their profile. Send the friend a message. Press the A button on the option that says “Send” at the top of their profile. A list of options will pop up; select “Send Message” here. Use the on-screen keyboard to type the message you want to send to your friend. Make sure you are careful about using too much shorthand; you want them to understand your message. Send the message. Press the A button on the “Send” button and your message will be sent. The conversation window will snap to the right side of the screen, and all you have to do now is wait for them to respond. Using a Windows 10 Computer Click the Start menu on the bottom left side of your computer. Some of your favorite apps and programs will pop up on the screen. Select the “All Apps” button at the bottom of the menu. Every app you have on your computer will pop up on the screen in alphabetical order. Load the Xbox app. Go down to “X” and look for the green Xbox app. Click on it to load the Xbox app on your computer. Log in. Do this by entering your Microsoft email address and password in the text fields on screen. Once you have entered your information, click the login button to load your profile inside the app. View online friends. Look at the right side of the app. You will see a list of all your friends who are currently online and ready to receive a message. Click the name of the friend you want to send a message to. All their profile information will load in the Xbox window. Select the “Message” button at the top of the app beside their name. A window will pop up that shows your previous conversation. Send your friend a message. Click the “Reply” button and type the message that you want them to see. Press the Enter button on your keyboard when you’re done, and the message will be sent to your friend. They will get the message on their Xbox One.
